oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Studio Watts
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Folded, poster-size brochure including graphics, photographs, and articles related to the activities and mission of the Studio Watts Workshop

The Studio Watts Workshop was founded as a community arts organization by James Woods and Guy Miller in 1964. The original Workshop was located at 103rd Street and Grandee in South-East Los Angeles. The Studio Watts Workshop became the Watts Community Housing Corporation in 1969
